title: Constructive Reports for Busy Parents
body: Focus on your child's effort and progress. We provide detailed analyses of the study process to reduce negative pressure and motivate students.

items.title: Motivational Summaries
items.body: Weekly digests that celebrate progress and guide future efforts.

items.title: Transparency Boost
